title: STAT+: Employers drop coverage for weight loss drugs as pharma’s direct-to-consumer programs grow
description: Doctors and groups representing employers said they’re increasingly hearing about companies cutting weight loss drugs out of health plans next year.
content: Doctors and groups representing employers said they’re increasingly hearing about companies cutting weight loss drugs out of health plans next year.
